description: I'm a Systems Engineering, currently working in the industry of software development. I’m passionate about developing efficient, scalable, and impactful digital solutions. I enjoy tackling technological challenges, continuously learning, and staying up to date in a constantly evolving industry. I’m driven by the opportunity to work on innovative projects and collaborate with dynamic teams to bring ideas to life. I’m always looking for new opportunities to continue growing professionally and contribute my knowledge to the development of digital products.

items.title: Secretaría Distrital de Integración Social (Subdirección para la Juventud) - Software Developer
items.details: I contributed to the technical design and architecture of the “Distrito Joven” platform, developing admin interfaces and CMS-integrated features. I streamlined content deployment and publishing workflows, and collaborated with cross-functional teams to ensure technical and visual consistency. I also managed code versioning and repository organization. The tech stack included ReactJS, Next.js, TailwindCSS, PayloadCMS, Node.js, and PostgreSQL.
